import React from 'react'; import avatar from './../../assets/img/ava.jpg'; import styles from './Friends.module.css' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import { reduxForm, Field } from 'redux-form'; import { Textarea, createField } from '../../components/common/FormControls/FormControls'; import { required} from '../../utils/validators/validator'; const PopUpMessage = ({ user, closePopup }) => { return
New message
Open full chat with {user.name}

{user.name}

Offline

} const addMessagePopup = (props) => { return
{createField(null, 'message-popup', [required], 'textarea', null, null)}
} const AddMessagePopupFormRedux = reduxForm({form: 'message-popup'})(addMessagePopup); export default PopUpMessage;
